checkBalance(address).details: Get the total asset value held in the platform

returns.balance: Total value of the asset in the platform

collectRewardTokens().details: Collect accumulated reward token and send to Vault.

params._assetToken: Address of the ERC-4626 asset token. eg frxETH or DAI
params._baseConfig: Base strategy config with platformAddress (ERC-4626 Vault contract), eg sfrxETH or sDAI, and vaultAddress (OToken Vault contract), eg VaultProxy or OETHVaultProxy

deposit(address,uint256).details: Deposit assets by converting them to shares

depositAll().details: Deposit the entire balance of assetToken to gain shareToken

params._rewardTokenAddresses: Address of reward token for platform

removePToken(uint256).details: If the ERC-4626 Tokenized Vault needed to be changed, a new contract would need to be deployed and the proxy updated.

setPTokenAddress(address,address).details: If the ERC-4626 Tokenized Vault needed to be changed, a new contract would need to be deployed and the proxy updated.

params._rewardTokenAddresses: Address array of the reward token

supportsAsset(address).details: Retuns bool indicating whether asset is supported by strategy

transferToken(address,uint256).details: Transfer token to governor. Intended for recovering tokens stuck in      strategy contracts, i.e. mistaken sends.

params._amount: Amount of the asset to transfer

withdrawAll().details: Remove all assets from platform and send them to Vault contract.

claimGovernance().notice: Claim Governance of the contract to a new account (`newGovernor`). Can only be called by the new Governor.

governor().notice: Returns the address of the current Governor.

initialize(address[],address[],address[].notice: Internal initialize function, to set up initial internal state

isGovernor().notice: Returns true if the caller is the current Governor.

removePToken(uint256).notice: is not supported for this strategy as the asset and ERC-4626 Tokenized Vault are set at deploy time.

safeApproveAllTokens().notice: Governor approves the the ERC-4626 Tokenized Vault to spend the asset.

setPTokenAddress(address,address).notice: is not supported for this strategy as the asset and ERC-4626 Tokenized Vault are set at deploy time.

transferGovernance(address).notice: Transfers Governance of the contract to a new account (`newGovernor`). Can only be called by the current Governor. Must be claimed for this to complete
